Gallery of examples

Carson Sievert

2020-04-22

Source: vignettes/Gallery.Rmd
Gallery.Rmd

Below are a few themes from https://themer.dev/

TODO: * Show the ports instead (or maybe others)? * Support the light variant? * Tab callback to change the page’s styling? * Integrate with rest of site (ditch pkgdown?)

Night Sky

thematic_on(
  bg = "#13222E", fg = "#ACBECC", accent = "#9770B2",
  font = font_spec("Fira Sans Condensed", scale = 1.2)
)

ggplot

library(ggplot2)
qplot(1:10)
#> Error : RStudio not running

lattice

lattice::show.settings()
#> Error : RStudio not running

base

image(volcano, col = thematic_get_option("sequential"))
#> Error : RStudio not running
#> Warning in image.default(volcano, col = thematic_get_option("sequential")):
#> supplied color is neither numeric nor character

Polar Ice

thematic_on(
  bg = "#44484F", fg = "#C7F3FF", accent = "#94CEF2",
  font = font_spec("Fira Sans Condensed", scale = 1.2)
)

ggplot

library(ggplot2)
qplot(1:10)
#> Error : RStudio not running

lattice::show.settings()
#> Error : RStudio not running

#> supplied color is neither numeric nor character

Finger Paint

thematic_on(
  bg = "#2A2021", fg = "#EDEBEE", accent = "#6484B5",
  font = font_spec("Fira Sans Condensed", scale = 1.2)

Right in the Teals

thematic_on(
  bg = "#171D1D", fg = "#CDDEDE", accent = "#00ACBD",
